step.stepText: The average of your last 3 blood glucose measurements has been plotted with the diamond.

The recommended change in dose has been highlighted in orange. Keep in mind that the 303 Protocol is only a guide based on your average blood glucose. It does not account for diet, exercise, and other important factors.
Choose the change in dose that you think is most appropriate with the spinner.
Click the Send button to save your choice and send a message to your coach. Remember to check for feedback from your coach before using a new dose of insulin.
The average of your last 3 blood glucose measurements has been plotted with the diamond.

A change in dose cannot be recommended because your medication adherence has not been perfect for the past 4 days. Increasing your dose when your adherence has not been perfect can lead to hypoglycemia.
The 303 protocol is only a guide. You can change your dose if there are factors that make it appropriate.
Click back if you do not want to make a change. Click Send to save your choice and send a message to your coach. Remember to check for feedback from your coach before using a new dose of insulin.
Your average blood glucose could not be plotted because you do not have 3 fasting blood glucose measurements since your last change in insulin dose.

subSteps.subStep: Only the 1st fasting measurement from each day counts
All 3 must be within the past 4 days (including 1 today)
